name: generate-vanity-numbers-ts
description: Generates vanity numbers and saves them to DynamoDB
author: Zubeyir Tercan

scripts.copy: copy src\AcronymKeys.csv build && xcopy node_modules\ build\node_modules\ /e /y /d
scripts.lambda-update: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name generate-vanity-numbers-ts --s3-bucket voicefoundry-artifacts-8106ee20 --s3-key generate-vanity-numbers-ts.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run copy && npm run zip && npm run s3-upload && npm run lambda-update
